name: Kenneth WELCH and Monica Welch, h/w, Appellants, v. HARLEYSVILLE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY

judges: Before FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Kenneth WELCH and Monica Welch, h/w, Appellants, v. HARLEYSVILLE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Bernard J. McLafferty, Philadelphia, for appellants.
Frederick T. Lachat, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
606 A.2d 1170
Kenneth WELCH and Monica Welch, h/w, Appellants, v. HARLEYSVILLE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 9, 1992.
Decided May 14, 1992.
Bernard J. McLafferty, Philadelphia, for appellants.
Frederick T. Lachat, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
